description_for_human: Advanced Solana (SOL) trading data gateway providing real-time market analysis from OKX exchange with 7-timeframe candlestick charts, comprehensive order book depth, live trade flows, system monitoring, and WebSocket streaming for professional crypto analysis and algorithmic trading.
description_for_model: Comprehensive SOL-USDT crypto data platform with: 1) Real-time ticker (price, volume, 24h change), 2) Multi-timeframe candlestick data (5m, 15m, 30m, 1H, 4H, 1D, 1W) with 500+ data points for scalping to long-term analysis, 3) 50-level order book depth with bid/ask spreads, 4) Recent trades with buy/sell indicators, 5) System health monitoring and performance metrics, 6) Real-time logs for troubleshooting, 7) WebSocket streaming capabilities. Optimized for AI-powered crypto analysis, trading strategies, market monitoring, and financial research.
